name: turbomole

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
TURBOMOLE: Program Package for ab initio Electronic Structure
Calculations. Note: Turbomole requires purchase of a license to
download. Go to the Turbomole home page, http://www.turbomole-gmbh.com,
for details. Spack will search the current directory for this file. It
is probably best to add this file to a Spack mirror so that it can be
found from anywhere. For information on setting up a Spack mirror see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
